name: SCENT LIST
description:
burying tree ~ wild apples mulled with warm spice, twisted oaks, black fir needles, dark earth, and crisp autumn air

claw & cobblestone ~black coffee, warmed jack o' lanterns, cinnamon, black pepper and cardamom, gingersnaps, fresh cream,  and a smear of aged black patchouli

coffee fiend ~dark roast coffee swirled with bitter cocoa and spiked with autumnal spices

gathering ~sweet potato pie spiced with nutmeg, cinnamon and clove, yellow apples, peach flesh, maple sugar cream, fallen leaves and a wisp of smoky amber

gloomy sunday ~dusty carnations, warm spiced tea, and antique sandalwood perfume

golden pumpkin ~ sweet pumpkin pulp, golden amber, warm spices, hot butterscotch, and a drip of honey

hobgoblin ~ tiny blueberry scones sprinkled with muscovado sugar, sticky labdanum, iron distilled patchouli, and smoky amber

incantare ~ soft citrus notes dusted with clove, haunting florals,  golden chunks of amber, sandalwood, and dark incense
  
rising ~captured swirls of smoke from a protecting bonfire, ancient incense, and sweetly rotten forest berries

tell the bees ~ golden honey infused with wildflowers and family secrets:   rich honey, berry wine, sticky beeswax, wildflowers,  almond milk, champaka, frankincense, clove, cinnamon and dry wood

winchester ~worn brown leather, sweet tobacco leaf, incense, amber, labdanum and smoldering woods

name: SKIN GLOSSING OIL halloween
description:
LIMITED EDITION

Skin Glossing Oil is a light, sprayable blend of elegant oils and moisture retaining extracts for soft and shimmering skin. 4 fl. oz

Please see SCENT LIST for blend notes. 

claw & cobblestone
gathering  (Mystery #1 sent in Summer orders)
gloomy sunday
golden pumpkin
hobgoblin  (Mystery #2 sent in Summer orders)
incantare
winchester

Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (Fractionated Coconut Oil), cyclomethicone,Simmondsia chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Olive Squalane, Cymbidium Grandiflorum (Orchid) Flower Extract, fragrance and/or essential oils

***The Limited Edition skin glosses are presented in violet apothecary style bottles this year.  They are shorter and wider than Haunt's normal skin gloss bottle- although both are 4 oz bottles, this one holds slightly less oil, and therefore the price will not be increased as is normal with Limited Editions ***

name: LUST lip balm
description:
LIMITED EDITION

Please choose:

pumpkin cake ~spice cake smothered in pumpkin buttercream

caramel apple ~bright green apples dipped in warm caramel 

cask ~darkly spiced blackberry wine and blood red creme de cassis  

candy corn ~honey-sweet Autumnal treats!


Cocos Nucifera (Virgin Coconut) Oil, Macadamia Ternifolia (Macadamia) Seed Oil, Theobroma cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax, beeswax, Olive Squalane, flavor, Passiflora Edulis (Passion Fruit) Oil
